name: 高等教育統計學（一）
description: 瞭解推論統計的基礎理論和常用方法，熟悉其運算操作，並能在研究實務上作適當的應用。
goals: 培養學生有關推論統計之知識與能力
協助學生執行研究論文所需之統計分析
培養學生應用電腦來解決統計分析之相關問題
syllabus:
週次

內          容

1

   Course orientation

   Introduction to the t statistics (I)

2

   Introduction to the t statistics (II)

3

t test with two independent samples (I)

4

t test with two independent samples (II)

5

   Hypothesis tests with related samples (I)

6

Hypothesis tests with related samples (II)

7

**Holiday****—****no class**

8

   Estimation

9

The chi-square statistics: Tests for goodness                 of fit and independence (I)

10

The chi-square statistics: Tests for goodness                              of fit and independence (II)

11

**(Mid-term Examination)**                                              

12

Introduction to analysis of variance (ANOVA) (I)

13

Introduction to analysis of variance (ANOVA) (II)

14

   Repeated-measures analysis of variance (I)

15

Repeated-measures analysis of variance (II)

16

   Application of computer software (SPSS) in statistical (I)

17

   Application of computer software (SPSS) in statistical (II)

18

**（Final Examination）**

methodologies.note: 講述高等統計概論與應用
